ngiemboon: À ge gʉa líe pa Mɔ́ɔfùɔ.
en: He's going to go look at the people called Moffo.

ngiemboon: Pi tó pà tàʼ pà tàʼ.
Tâm gyǎ tsɔ̌ nzàʼ pà nɔ̀ɔn wá á gẅiin mendóŋ twó yé méntá.
en: Tam saw a strange animal that had three horns on its head.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n kǎa mekáŋ pâ mekʉŋ ńtÿɔ́ʼɔ ndá.
en: I carried the plates with the pots to put in the house.

ngiemboon: À cǔa mbwó mé lê páb.

en: Split the yam into several pieces.
Open the book to page three.

ngiemboon: Te gÿo mekèle metúʼ, gÿo pɔ́ me mepàg.
en: Don't make the donuts round, make the dishes instead.
